gear.name: dtiinit
gear.label: VISTALAB: dtiInit - Diffusion Data Initialization Pipeline
gear.description: VISTALAB's dtiInit (DTI Initialization) runs the VISTASOFT/mrDiffusion pre-processing pipeline on raw DWI data. This Gear allows all dtiInit parameters to be set from within the configuration UI. All outputs are archived in a zip file for easy download. dtiInit.json is saved for easy reference to configuration parameters used at runtime.
gear.author: VISTA Lab, Stanford University

anatomical.description: OPTIONAL: Anatomical (e.g., t1-weighted) NIfTI file. During the initial phase of processing the diffusion data (b=0 images) will be aligned to this image. By default the dwi data will be aligned to the MNI_EPI template.

bvec.description: REQUIRED: File containing a list of diffusion b-vectors.

bval.description: REQUIRED: File containing a list of diffusion b-values.
